name: Fountain of Scorching Sands
description: A plant with an appearance like flowing sand. According to some legends, treasures are often buried under these plants. A group of Treasure Hoarders once came all the way to Sumeru looking for them, only to dig around for hours without finding anything. After several failed attempts, these Treasure Hoarders changed tactics and began ambushing adventurers who had also come to look for treasure. However, they were quickly taken down by the most elite adventurers and handed over to the Corps of Thirty...
